title: BRIEF-Vodafone Idea Says Did Not Request Any Lender For Debt Recast
text:
BRIEF-Vodafone Idea Says Did Not Request Any Lender For Debt Recast

Stock Markets 6 minutes ago (Oct 30, 2019 14:48)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Vodafone Idea Says Did Not Request Any Lender For Debt Recast Oct 30 (Reuters) - Vodafone (LON: ) Idea Ltd : * VODAFONE IDEA SAYS HAVE NOT MADE ANY REQUEST FOR DEBT RECAST TO ANY LENDER OR ASKED FOR REWORKING OF PAYMENT TERMS * CONTINUE TO PAY ALL OUR DEBTS AS AND WHEN THESE FALL DUE * "CATEGORICALLY DENY AND DISMISS" MEDIA REPORTS THAT CO HAS APPROACHED LENDERS FOR DEBT RECAST Further company coverage: VODA.NS

BRIEF-Vodafone Idea Says Did Not Request Any Lender For Debt Recast
